documents.document: @ZoeMarkham You'll be needing a tin hat at this rate
@gemofagite Merry Christmas 🎄
@MrsPriddleX It's contagious!! I like it 😀
Just heard first Christmas song of 2017 - a little girl walking in Shanklin was singing Jingle Bells. Merry Christmas 🎄
@ZoeMarkham Come back 2016, all is forgiven
@ZoeMarkham He can have mine
@ZoeMarkham What state were the shoes in when he came home from school?
@ZoeMarkham They look nice
@lifefrance French Boulangerie, wish we had one here. Have a great week - from a wet IoW
See you next year https://t.co/ZmlWKaretx
@TheFranceShow I'd head to 1st floor to hear @ianmodmoore & @lillyzazou & the culinary displays (in fact I did on Friday & enjoyed it)
@ianmodmoore It's a hard life
@lifefrance We'll agree with that! Could be another reason for liking France!! 😀🇫🇷
@ianmodmoore Very funny Yann, and I hope this afternoon goes well (& your journey home)
A very good read. I won't spoil it but the Netherlands get a mention 😀 https://t.co/Ma4ZKRmth5

@ZoeMarkham T**g has more subtle means. It involves claws

@leannef55 How do you get an odd 62p?
@ZoeMarkham Sounds familiar. The only time ours go out is to fertilise the garden - and then they're straight back in wanting feeding 😺
@ZoeMarkham @Number10cat I can get you two feline helpers, as well as more dreamies
@leannef55 @SkyNews Couldn't have put it better myself

Sounds a very good idea https://t.co/jsjQUwUEdj
@ZoeMarkham It quite possibly does untune itself, metal strings can expand in heat
@lillyzazou Well if today was anything to go by you'll do well
@ianmodmoore Oh yes. Front row, cat owner who'd read your books. We thoroughly enjoyed your performance. Well done
@ZoeMarkham You're doing well, just work at it and you'll get to be an accomplished player. Just a little bit a day. Use S as a singer😀
@lillyzazou You did! Wonderful performance. Thoroughly enjoyed it 😀
Another photo of #LillyZazou at @TheFranceShow https://t.co/IQPU8wohR2

@Jan_Marshall Thanks Jan. Have a good weekend xx
@lifefrance Look forward to it!! Happy compiling
@lifefrance Another reason is their wine. Cheers 🍾🍷😀
@lifefrance 1 reason I like France is they have much better manners than the UK (& yes you can quote me). Still like their cakes though 😀
@lifefrance Delicious is the first description that comes to mind (& better than cakes in UK). Ok for starters?
@france_images We stumbled across Falaise by accident - and keep going back. We love the place 😀
@ZoeMarkham When ever I see her or hear about her I keep singing Cruella de Ville!
Love Falaise. Great Chateau, interesting market on Saturday and as for the cafes... 😀🇫🇷😀 https://t.co/rkMfGrPwPy
@runalongwomble @ZoeMarkham It's time for the IoW to declare UDI

@ZoeMarkham That is so true 😀

@ZoeMarkham Agreed. Sod Corbyn

@Rachs_charlie & the rest of the year! Thankfully it hasn't the stigma it used to have. Hope you're ok. Hugs xx

@ZoeMarkham As you say no need for that, but my cat 'T' & I will sort them out for you if you want. You'll get there one day, keep going xx
